pages.text: Conditions are used in Adjustment process.$(br)Conditions to apply to your item: Day/Night/Constant/Use/Hit/Manual/Light/Spell
$(l)Day$() - if this condition is defined - spell will activate on Daytime once per second.
$(l)Night$() - if this condition is defined - spell will activate on Nighttime once per second.
$(l)Constant$() - if this condition is defined - spell will activate once per second as long as you have enough mana.
$(l)Use$() - if this condition is defined - spell will activate when you use item.
$(l)Hit$() - if this condition is defined - spell will activate when you hit with item.
$(l)Manual$() - if this condition is defined - spell will activate when you press `Chant Activation key` from Keyboard Settings, or just use your mana to use it.
$(l)Light$() - if this condition is defined - spell will activate when there is [Parameter you've set] %% of light or lower. Example: `Mana, shape adjust, add condition light, add parameter 50`
$(l)Spell$() - if this condition is defined - spell will activate when you use SPELLCASTING ITEM with spell called `Chanting` in slot you've bound spell in.
1) Take wand, apply spell called `Chanting` on it. It's craft-able just like Magic Missile!$(br)2) Choose said spell with your wand in hand.

$(br)3) Do Inscription process to wand. If successful -> Look on tooltip, there be your Spell bound to chosen slot.$(br)4) Write in Chat this: `Mana, shape adjust, add condition spell`.$(br)5) When you'll use Chanting spell, if there bound to this slot Chant, it'll activate.
This means you can bind your Chant to specific wand slot, and activate it if on this slot you'll apply Chanting spellbook.
